entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
